verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician אַל־ תַּשְׁחֵ֗ת <S%H516><s%> Altaschith לְדָוִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> of David מִכְתָּֽם׃ <S%H4387><s%> Michtam הַֽאֻמְנָ֗ם <S%H552><s%> Do ye indeed אֵ֣לֶם <S%H482><s%> congregation צֶ֭דֶק <S%H6664><s%> righteousness תְּדַבֵּר֑וּן <S%H1696><s%> speak מֵישָׁרִ֥ים <S%H4339><s%> uprightly תִּ֝שְׁפְּט֗וּ <S%H8199><s%> avenge בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> O ye sons אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> man

אַף־ <S%H637><s%> No בְּלֵב֮ <S%H3820><s%> Yea in heart עוֹלֹ֪ת <S%H5766><s%> wickedness תִּפְעָ֫ל֥וּן <S%H6466><s%> ye work בָּאָ֡רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the earth חֲמַ֥ס <S%H2555><s%> the violence יְ֝דֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H3027><s%> of your hands תְּפַלֵּֽסֽוּן׃ <S%H6424><s%> ye weigh

זֹ֣רוּ <S%H2114><s%> are estranged רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> The wicked מֵרָ֑חֶם <S%H7358><s%> from the womb תָּע֥וּ <S%H8582><s%> they go astray מִ֝בֶּ֗טֶן <S%H990><s%> as soon as they be born דֹּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1696><s%> speaking כָזָֽב׃ <S%H3577><s%> lies

חֲמַת־ <S%H2534><s%> Their poison לָ֗מוֹ כִּדְמ֥וּת <S%H1823><s%> [is] like חֲמַת־ <S%H2534><s%> the poison נָחָ֑שׁ <S%H5175><s%> of a serpent כְּמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> Like פֶ֥תֶן <S%H6620><s%> adder חֵ֝רֵ֗שׁ <S%H2795><s%> [they are] like the deaf יַאְטֵ֥ם <S%H331><s%> [that] stoppeth אָזְנֽוֹ׃ <S%H241><s%> her ear

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> So לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not יִ֭שְׁמַע <S%H8085><s%> Which will not hearken לְק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> to the voice מְלַחֲשִׁ֑ים <S%H3907><s%> of charmers חוֹבֵ֖ר <S%H2266><s%> caster חֲבָרִ֣ים <S%H2267><s%> of spells מְחֻכָּֽם׃ <S%H2449><s%> never so wisely

אֱ‍ֽלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> O God הֲרָס־ <S%H2040><s%> Break שִׁנֵּ֥ימוֹ <S%H8127><s%> their teeth בְּפִ֑ימוֹ <S%H6310><s%> in their mouth מַלְתְּע֥וֹת <S%H4459><s%> the great teeth כְּ֝פִירִ֗ים <S%H3715><s%> of the young lions נְתֹ֣ץ ׀ <S%H5422><s%> break out יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> O LORD

יִמָּאֲס֣וּ <S%H3988><s%> Let them melt away כְמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> like מַ֭יִם <S%H4325><s%> as waters יִתְהַלְּכוּ־ <S%H1980><s%> [which] run continually לָ֑מוֹ יִדְרֹ֥ךְ <S%H1869><s%> [when] he bendeth [חִצֹּו כ] (חִ֝צָּ֗יו <S%H2671><s%> archer ק) כְּמ֣וֹ <S%H3644><s%> like יִתְמֹלָֽלוּ׃ <S%H4135><s%> let them be as cut in pieces

כְּמ֣וֹ <S%H3644><s%> as שַׁ֭בְּלוּל <S%H7642><s%> As a snail תֶּ֣מֶס <S%H8557><s%> [which] melteth יַהֲלֹ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> let [every one of them] pass away נֵ֥פֶל <S%H5309><s%> [like] the untimely birth אֵ֝֗שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> of a woman בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> never חָ֥זוּ <S%H2372><s%> [that] they may not see שָֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <S%H8121><s%> the sun

בְּטֶ֤רֶם <S%H2962><s%> Before יָבִ֣ינוּ <S%H995><s%> can feel סִּֽירֹתֵיכֶ֣ם <S%H5518><s%> Before your pots אָטָ֑ד <S%H329><s%> the thorns כְּמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> alike חַ֥י <S%H2416><s%> both living כְּמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> alike חָ֝ר֗וֹן <S%H2740><s%> and in [his] wrath יִשְׂעָרֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H8175><s%> he shall take them away as with a whirlwind

יִשְׂמַ֣ח <S%H8055><s%> shall rejoice צַ֭דִּיק <S%H6662><s%> The righteous כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> when חָזָ֣ה <S%H2372><s%> when he seeth נָקָ֑ם <S%H5359><s%> the vengeance פְּעָמָ֥יו <S%H6471><s%> his feet יִ֝רְחַ֗ץ <S%H7364><s%> he shall wash בְּדַ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> in the blood הָרָשָֽׁע׃ <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked

וְיֹאמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> shall say אָ֭דָם <S%H120><s%> So that a man אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> Surely פְּרִ֣י <S%H6529><s%> Verily [there is] a reward לַצַּדִּ֑יק <S%H6662><s%> for the righteous אַ֥ךְ <S%H389><s%> Surely יֵשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> verily he is אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> a God שֹׁפְטִ֥ים <S%H8199><s%> that judgeth בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> in the earth
